languages.text: "Человек, твоя душа слаба, но суд все же счел ее достойной. ПРИМИ ЖЕ ДАР ВЕЛИКОЙ РАСЫ!"

traits.locale_text: "Человек, твоя душа слаба, но суд все же счел ее достойной. ПРИМИ ЖЕ ДАР ВЕЛИКОЙ РАСЫ!"

languages.text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"
languages.original_text: "Человек, твоя душа слаба, но суд все же счел ее достойной. ПРИМИ ЖЕ ДАР ВЕЛИКОЙ РАСЫ!"

traits.locale_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

"Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

languages.text: 「人間よ、お前の精神はかくも弱いが、法廷はお前を認めた。栄光ある種族からの恩恵を受け取るのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

traits.locale_text: 「人間よ、お前の精神はかくも弱いが、法廷はお前を認めた。栄光ある種族からの恩恵を受け取るのだ！」

languages.text: «Tu espíritu es débil, humano, pero el tribunal lo ha considerado digno. ¡ACEPTA UN DON DE LA GLORIOSA RAZA!».
languages.original_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

traits.locale_text: «Tu espíritu es débil, humano, pero el tribunal lo ha considerado digno. ¡ACEPTA UN DON DE LA GLORIOSA RAZA!».

languages.text: “你的灵魂很孱弱，人类，但王庭仍旧认可你的价值。领群无上荣耀的种族赐予你的礼物吧！”
languages.original_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

traits.locale_text: “你的灵魂很孱弱，人类，但王庭仍旧认可你的价值。领群无上荣耀的种族赐予你的礼物吧！”

languages.text: « Votre esprit est faible, {mf|humain|humaine}, mais la cour l'a jugé suffisamment digne. ACCEPTEZ CE DON DE LA RACE GLORIEUSE ! »
languages.original_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre esprit est faible, {mf|humain|humaine}, mais la cour l'a jugé suffisamment digne. ACCEPTEZ CE DON DE LA RACE GLORIEUSE ! »

languages.text: "Euer Geist ist schwach, Mensch, und doch hat der Hof ihn für würdig befunden. AKZEPTIERT DEN SEGEN DES GLORREICHEN VOLKS!"
languages.original_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"

traits.locale_text: "Euer Geist ist schwach, Mensch, und doch hat der Hof ihn für würdig befunden. AKZEPTIERT DEN SEGEN DES GLORREICHEN VOLKS!"

languages.text: "Mahkeme, zayıf olsa da ruhunu şayan buldu insan. YÜCE IRKIN LÜTFUNU KABUL ET!"
languages.original_text: "Your spirit is weak, human, and yet the court has deemed it worthy. ACCEPT A BOON FROM THE GLORIOUS RACE!"
